Silva TOC Code Source changes

0.3

- neaten up the toc rendering with line breaks so tags don't appear on one line

0.2

- update the 'paths' parameter to use the new features of the lookup window
  field (e.g. multiple references, new javascript onclick code)

0.1

- correct the items call syntax - use the tocrendering adapters
  compute_default_types call for the default items, rather than a hard-coded 
  list

0.1a

    - Initial development.
